page.para: The man who sneezed ver/y loud/ly
Once there was a man who sneezed ver/y loud/ly.
A/choo! The first time he sneezed Un/cle Ra/mu tripped and fell.
A/choo! He sneezed so loud the birds shiv/ered in the trees.
A/choo! He sneezed so loud the mice want/ed to hide.
A/choo! He sneezed so loud a fish jumped out of the wa/ter in fright!
Eve/ry/one feared the manâ€™s sneez/ing e/ven when he was quiet.
A/choo! What could be done to stop all the sneez/ing?
The only thing to do was to sneeze just as loud/ly too! A/choo! A/choo!
